query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `activity_logs` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `activity_type` ENUM(
    'application_submitted',
    'application_reviewed',
    'application_shortlisted',
    'application_rejected',
    'interview_scheduled',
    'interview_completed',
    'interview_cancelled',
    'status_changed',
    'candidate_added',
    'job_posted',
    'job_updated',
    'job_closed',
    'assessment_completed',
    'offer_sent',
    'offer_accepted',
    'offer_rejected',
    'resume_uploaded',
    'profile_updated'
  ) NOT NULL,
  `user_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `candidate_id` INT,
  `job_id` INT,
  `application_id` INT,
  `title` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `metadata` JSON,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `activity_logs` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `activity_type` ENUM(

    'assessment_completed',
    'offer_sent',
    'offer_accepted',

    'profile_updated'
  ) NOT NULL,
  `user_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `candidate_id` INT,
  `job_id` INT,
  `application_id` INT,
  `title` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `metadata` JSON,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
